1.content:
It was a Friday morning in May and Evan did not want to get up for school. There was still a month of school left and he was ready for the summer. Evan groggily crawled out of bed and made his way to the bathroom. His head was spinning and he felt way more tired than he usually did in the morning. As he exited his room he crossed paths with his older sister Stephanie who, being a college freshmen, was already home for the summer.

"Good morning Evan," she said cheerily before heading downstairs. Evan mumbled some sort of response before going into the bathroom. Evan thought Stephanie was crazy. She was home now and could sleep as late as she wanted and she chose to get up at 7 in the morning. Evan wished he could still be sleeping right now.

What the hell is going on? he thought as he stared into the mirror. Why is my head pounding like this?

That's when he suddenly remembered the dream he had last night, the voice in his head. It had told him that he now had the power to swap anything with another person as long as he had their permission. It sounded absurd, but maybe, just maybe, this pounding in his head was due to the fact that he had been imbued with this power.

He was dying to know, so he forced himself to get ready as fast as possible so he could see if it was true. Once he was dressed, Evan headed downstairs and took stock of what he had to work with. His father Jack had already left for work but the rest of his family was in the kitchen. There was Stephanie of course, and his younger tomboy of a sister Alex and his mother Miranda who was a fourth grade teacher. Evan thought about what he would do before deciding to...
1.title: What a Strange Dream...

After eating breakfast, Evan waited for his mother and Alex to leave the room and then approached Stephanie about his new power.

"Hey Stephanie," he said. "I gained this power that lets me swap anything with another person."

"Are you feeling alright?" his sister asked with a laugh.

"I'm being serious. I had this dream that told me I have this power and I just feel like it's true."

"Just because you had a dream doesn't make it true," said Stephanie.

"Can we at least give it a try?" Evan asked.

"I guess it can't hurt," Stephanie agreed.

"Okay what do you want to try swapping?' Evan asked his sister.

"Hmm..." said Stephanie. "How about we try swapping...

111.content:
"What?" Evan asked, not quite sure what his sister meant.

"You know, let's swap where we go to school. You'll become a college student and I'll become a high schooler again. If you really do have this power, I think it might be fun to be in high school again. Besides, you look like you need a break and since I'm out for the summer you won't have to go to school today."

"Sounds fair to me," Evan agreed. "Now, let's see here. How does this power work?"

Stephanie laughed. "You tell me."

Evan shrugged. "I guess I just concentrate or something." He focused on swapping school with Stephanie and, moments later, he felt an energy flowing through him for a brief second. "There. I think it worked."

"I feel the same, bro," Stephanie said.

"Well, it's not like it's something we can check easily to see if it worked," Evan said.

He started thinking of how they could test it out, but nothing immediately came to mind. Luckily, their mother happened to walk by and solve the problem for them. "Evan, stop distracting your sister or you'll make her late for school," she said.

Evan and Stephanie both looked at their mother in surprise. "Like, for high school?" Evan asked.

"Yes, for high school," his mom replied. "Where else would she be going?" She seemed to think nothing was wrong with this statement.

Evan and Stephanie looked at each other, resisting the urge to laugh.

"I can't believe that actually worked!" Stephanie exclaimed once their mother was out of earshot.

"I guess that dream was true after all," Evan said in agreement.

"Well, you heard Mom," Stephanie said. "I'm gonna be late for school. I'll try not to fail all your classes for you!" she added, jokingly.

"Ha ha, very funny," Evan replied.

"Don't worry bro, I've been through those classes before."

"Fair enough," Evan said. "And you'll have my schedule to help you figure out where to go."

"Sounds good," Stephanie said. "Enjoy your day off Evan."

Once Stephanie left, Evan went back to his room and climbed back into bed. Since he didn't have to go to school anymore, he was going to take advantage of it.

Evan woke up a few hours later feeling much better. After grabbing a bite to eat, Evan plopped down on the couch and thought about what to do next. His sisters and his friends were all at school and both his parents were at work, so he couldn't do swaps with any of them just yet. "What to do, then?" Evan asked himself.

11111.content:
"Oh, hey Christine," Evan greeted his neighbor, who was retrieving the mail from her mailbox.

"How's it going?" Christine asked, smiling. "Enjoying being done with your first year of college?"

"Uh, yeah ... sure," Evan said. Even though he'd already experienced this when talking to his mom, Evan was amazed that Christine thought it was normal that he was a 17 year old in college with a sister two years older still in high school.

"Don't sound too excited," Christine laughed.

"Well it's just that ..." Evan started to say before trailing off in hesitation. He was debating whether or not to tell Christine about his power. She had been his neighbor for a few years now, and she seemed like a trustworthy individual, but he wasn't sure if she would actually believe him if he told her.

"It's just what?" Christine asked.

"Well, I have this power to swap traits with people," Evan said, deciding to confide in his neighbor.

"What are you talking about?" Christine asked, a confused expression on her face.

"Last night I had this dream where I was given the power to swap anything between myself and a willing individual," Evan explained. "Body parts, personality traits, you name it. When I woke up, I actually had the power from the dream."

"Are you serious?" Christine asked, incredulously.

"Yeah. I already tried swapping with Stephanie. We swapped school, which is why she's at school now and I'm home."

"That doesn't seem right. You've always been ahead of your sister in school."

"The power makes those not involved in the swaps think everything is normal," Evan explained. "Think about it, Christine. Does it make any sense that Steph is two years behind me in school despite being two years older?"

"I guess you have a point there," Christine said. "How about you show me this power of yours in action and swap something with me?"

"Alright, what do you want to swap with me?" Evan asked.

"Hmm," Christine said as she thought it over.
11111.title: Christine Wallace, the hot 28 year old blonde w...

choices: Christine wants to make another small physical swap
Christine wants to step it up and try a larger physical swap

111111.content:
"How about something small to start?" Christine suggested. "This is just a proof of concept after all. If, and that's a pretty big if, this power of yours is real, then I want to start small."

"That's okay with me," Evan told his neighbor. "Wouldn't want you freaking out from a big swap. What did you have in mind?"

"You said you can swap anything right?" Christine asked.

"Yup," Evan said, nodding. "Anything."

"Well, in that case, I've always wished I was a bit taller," Christine said.

"So you want to swap height with me?" Evan asked.

"Yeah," Christine said. "It's something simple yet easy to confirm."

"Alright, and now that you've given permission I can swap us," Evan said.

Focusing on making the swap, Evan suddenly felt himself shrinking. Before long, he was down from his average 5'10" height to Christine's height of 5'6". Christine, meanwhile, gained the same four inches that Evan lost. A surprised expression appeared on her face too.

"Oh my God!" She gasped. "I can't believe it worked! I'm taller now! And our clothes even adjusted to fit our new proportions!"

"I told you it was real," Evan said.

"Say, Evan, do you mind if we stay like this for a while?" Christine asked. "I'd love to experience being taller for a bit."

"That's fine with me," Evan agreed. "I'll come by later?"

"Sounds good," Christine agreed.

"Alright, cool," Evan said before starting to walk off.

"Wait, Evan," Christine said.

"What is it?" Evan asked. "Is there something else you want to swap?"

1111111.content:
"Yes, actually," Christine said. "There was one other small thing I wanted to swap."

"What is it?" Evan asked.

"Well, you see," Christine started to explain, "I need to do some work around the house today, but I just got my nails done." She held up her hands to show off her freshly manicured hands, complete with pale pink nail polish. "I was concerned about messing that up, but your little power can help me out here."

"So you want to swap hands for a bit too," Evan concluded.

Christine smiled back at him. "Exactly," she said.

"That can be arranged," Evan said. "All I need is your permission."

"You have it," his neighbor replied.

Evan nodded. "Alright."

He focused on making the swap and felt his hands begin to change. The reduced in size a bit, becoming daintier and distinctly feminine. Looking down at his hands, Evan saw that he now had Christine's immaculately manicured nails hands, right down to her pink painted nails. Giving them a quick rub together, he found that they were also smoother to the touch than his own hands. Meanwhile, Christine now had Evan's larger, rougher male hands.

"Wow," Christine said as she gave them a look over. Despite now having male hands, she fanned out her fingers in a quite feminine way to examine them. She then clenched her new fists and smiled. "Now I don't need to worry about chipping a nail while I do my housework. Thanks, Evan."

"Sure, no problem," Evan replied, taking another glance as his new hands. "I guess I'll come back later after you finish your work."

"Sounds good," Christine said. "We can swap our height back to normal then too. It'll be a few hours at least."

"Alright," Evan said. "That's fine with me."

"Thanks again for doing this, Evan," Christine said. "How about I return the favor and let you swap something of your choice with me as well?"

"You don't have to do that," Evan told his neighbor. "I'm happy to help."

"It's the least I can do for you helping me out," Christine said.

Evan shrugged. "If you insist. I'll need to think about what to swap, though."

"Take your time," Christine laughed. "We can swap whatever you choose another time, if you want."

"Fair enough," said Evan.

"Either way is fine with me," Christine continued. "Just let me know what you want to do."

“Yeah, do you … um … do you think we could swap something mental?” Christine asked. Evan looked up at Christine a bit surprised how much of a difference 4 inches could male. “Uh, I guess so. What did you have in mind? I mean, so long as we both agree I think it’s all fair game,” he explained. Christine tapped her bottom lip, “Do you think we could swap fears?”

Evan tilted his head wondering what she was talking about. “Oh, don’t look at me like I’m crazy! We just swapped heights for crying out loud!” she exclaimed.

“But I get to swap something else with you afterwards! Alright? I feel like these swaps are getting pretty one-sided.”

“Deal!”

“Alright, I agree to swap fears with you,” Evan said and his power got to work right away. The change wasn’t immediately obvious like the previous one, but something told Evan that it worked. What neither one of them had thought of was that fears run deeply into subconscious too. Evan wasn’t just afraid of creepy bugs and the like, he had all the fears of a 28 year old woman like Christine. He wasn’t consciously aware of it, but he feared getting older and not finding Mr. Right, not being attractive enough and more.

“Ok, what would like to swap in return?” Christine asked.

11421.content:
"C'mon, little bro! Let's play a round together... think you can teach me a thing or two?" Stephanie smirked coyly, tucking her hair behind her ears. She crossed her legs neatly under her denim jeans, leaned back against Evan's bedpost, and motioned for him to sit down next to her on the carpet.

He grabbed a PlayStation controller and sat next to her, while she toggled the controls to start a one-on-one death match. While she was fiddling with the layout, weapon drop, and other settings, Evan got ready to trounce his older sister. This was a first person shooter he loved playing; he knew all the tricks, optimizations, drop locations, every minor detail that could give him an advantage over his hapless sister. Evan didn't recall Stephanie ever actually playing video games in her life, with the exception of a few casual PC games on social media with her friends. Though she boasted an impressive amount of kills, she could also be taking the piss out of him. He almost felt bad playing against her. Maybe, Evan resolved, he might give her a few pity kills at the beginning so it doesn't look too lopsided.

The match began on a military base surrounded by a jungle landscape. But...

... Waitaminute.

What was Evan supposed to do again?

He stared down at his controller. What the heck did all these symbols mean?

Gah! It's like something was clouding his mind... making it difficult to grasp the knowledge he knew he should have. Like grains of sand falling through a sieve, Evan struggled to recall even the basics of how to play the game. But the harder he tried, the more those memories faded away. He glanced over at Stephanie, who was intently viewing the television screen and roaming her delicate fingers over the buttons like a maestro runs his hands over piano keys. Meanwhile, he tried pressing a few buttons to see what happened on screen, taking a very deliberate and slow process re-learning the controls.

His thumb grazed over the control stick, and he saw his character jerk forward. Of course! That big rotating doohickey makes the guy move around. He tried it a few more times before his character suddenly crumpled over in a bloody mess. Fatality, the screen flashed in grim lettering.

Stephanie had sniped his character from a ledge halfway across the stage.

"Pow! Head shot!" She exclaimed, giggling like the 19-year old college girl she was.

"Lucky shot!" Evan scowled. "That was a freebie."

Evan's older sister glanced over smugly. "Was it? Really? Or am I now the pro and you're the 'noob' at video games?"

He decided not to dignify her with a response, especially because he wasn't sure whether 'noob' was a good thing or a bad thing. Again, he felt like he should know but at the moment it sounded like a put down.

"I didn't realise how detailed and intricate this game is," Mentioned Stephanie as Evan's character re-spawned somewhere else in the jungle. "Playing this game just feels so right, y'know?"

He wished he could agree, but the more Evan played the worse he felt he was getting. Evan's character re-spawned several times, and within seconds each time Stephanie found some clever way to bring about his demise. To his frustration, most of these kills came as a complete surprise as he was still spending most of his time figuring out how to pick up and use the many shooty-things in the game. (To Evan's chagrin, Stephanie helpfully identified each weapon's model, make, and degree of usefulness in jungle terrain. What the heck is a FAL, anyway?)

"You might want to look at the radar in the lower part of your screen," She suggested. "It shows you where other players and power ups are located, including--"

"I know what it does!" He snapped. A few more minutes passed, and she killed him a few more times. The cheeky girl was now tea-bagging his corpse after each death, which would have been annoying if Evan's friends were doing it. But his own sister, who wouldn't know the difference between Super Mario Brothers and Super Smash Brothers? That was mortifying.

The round mercifully ended, with Stephanie having killed Evan no less than 43 times. He hadn't managed to kill her once. The loading screen reappeared and Evan stood up angrily.

Stephanie was trying not to laugh. "Wow! You're right Evan, this game is a lot of fun. Hey... where are you going?"

"Out!" He replied tersely, wanting to be anywhere but in his own room watching his sister dominate at his favourite game. He had never felt so disgusted: at her for being so much better, or at himself for ever liking such a stupid game. Did he only like playing it because he was good at it? Or could this be something of Stephanie's that got swapped along with his video gaming skills?

"Wait, don't go just yet!" She called out to her brother, chasing after him as he was about to step outside. "Don't think of it as me beating you... more like your gaming skills are so much better than mine. It's a compliment!"

Evan turned around and sighed. "You're right. Sorry for snapping at you back there. It's just..."

"... You don't like getting btfo'd at your own game?" Stephanie finished his thought. Seeing his confused expression, she added, "BTFO? Y'know... blown-the-fuck-out. It's leet speak."

"Leet speak?" Evan frowned.

"Geez, was I really that clueless?" Stephanie remarked. She changed the subject, "Look, I think I know what will cheer you up! Follow me!"

---


"Very good!" Stephanie beamed, beholding the acrylic painting Evan whipped up in no time in his bedroom an hour later. "You'd give Bob Ross himself a run for his money, I'd wager!"

Evan dipped a thin paintbrush back into the cup on a stand next to the easel. The canvas, white just an hour ago, now showed a dazzling sunrise over a lake. The composition, perspective, and relief provided by the mountains against the water in the foreground were exquisite, far better than anything Evan had ever attempted before. He felt at home gliding the brushstrokes against the canvas. Mixing colours and shades together on his palette to get that slightest tinge of cirrus blue here, a smack of forest green there, a loud sailor's delight red against the sky.

What's more: Evan somehow knew a wealth of information on art. And not just contemporary techniques, but historical movements too. He felt he could speak intelligently about the differences between Impressionism and Expressionism, between a Manet and a Monet piece, why Jackson Pollack was so tragically misunderstood yet Degas was the biggest shithead who ever lived. He felt he could analyze art. It wasn't all pretentious rubbish like he thought.

All of these explosions of insight and beauty were thanks to Stephanie, whose skill as an artist Evan had overlooked until now. He had always viewed art as the kind of limp-wristed fruitiness reserved for... well... for girls. Not for red-blooded guys like him.

"I can't believe how good I am!" Stephanie caught herself, "I mean, how good you are, ha ha." The canvas and art supplies were in Stephanie's bedroom just like the PlayStation console was still in Evan's bedroom. Apparently, the swap only affected the minds of Evan and Stephanie with respect to skills; there was no transfer of owned items. Stephanie suggested swapping ownership over those things, which Evan naturally agreed to. In a flash, all of Evan's art supplies now rested in a drawer next to his nightstand, and several blank canvases stacked up against his bed. His video game disks, consoles, controllers, and other equipment now belonged to Stephanie.

What happens next?

Stephanie likewise had all of Evan's skills when it came to playing baseball, but she didn't want to play it anymore than she had before.

When it came to more 'asexual' activities like painting or video games. Evan still loved to play video games, he just wasn't any good at them now. Not that with some practice he could become as good as Stephanie's video game potential. As for art, now that Evan knew much more about it, he could appreciate painting much more than he ever had before.

Likewise, Stephanie didn't have the knowledge or practical experience of all the years she painted, but that didn't mean she didn't have Evan's undeveloped drawing ability. She could exploit it (with her inherit artistic preference) to make beautiful pieces with a little practice. Although her artistic style had changed. She also found that video games were fun now that she had been exposed to them. It might not be the first thing she would like to do, but that didn't mean she would avoid them entirely.

What the swap had done was given the siblings more in common as their preferences and skills became intertwined. Each's preferences becoming more like the other as each realized their new skill set. 114212.title: Stephanie and Evan see what other skills swapped

1142122.content:
Over the next few hours, brother and sister tested out their newfound skills and learned more about each other.

First, Stephanie and Evan walked to the nearby park and practiced throwing a ball. The grass at the park was still wet from a recent rainstorm, and the sun had broken through the clouds in the early May morning. In short, it was a lovely day for Evan to play hooky from school.

Stephanie stretched her arms for a moment before slipping a leathery baseball mitt over her hand and walking a long distance away. She reached back and fired the ball into Evan's mitt, which he struggled to return from such a distance. Since they didn't swap upper body strength, she couldn't throw as hard as he could when he played for several years in little league. However, technique had a lot to do with it as well. Evan couldn't figure out the best way to wrap his fingers around the ball, or how to snap his arm back to deliver the throw as Stephanie was doing so naturally. He ended up shot-putting it weakly away.

"You throw like a girl," Stephanie teased, padding forward to pick up and dry the ball which rolled pathetically in the grass up to her. She was wearing Evan's favourite baseball cap, now fitted for her head with her pony tail poking out the back. His 19-year old sister then stood behind him, instructing him on how to improve his arm and hand into a better throwing motion. He tried to ignore her DD-cup breasts pushing up against his back as she positioned his elbow and shoulder in the right place.

They tossed around for another half hour before returning home. Stephanie then suggested he put on her makeup, to which he recoiled instantly until she clarified he put it on for her. She planned to hang out with her friends later and wanted to look nice.

"So you want me to get you ready?" Evan shouted nervously from behind the locked washroom door. His sister broke a sweat outside and was rinsing off. "Why not swap back then?"

"Not yet! Wouldn't it be fun to stay like this for a while?" She shouted back over the shower running.

It would be fun, Evan thought to himself. But what if something goes wrong? He only discovered this power this morning... what if it's only temporary? What if they can't switch back for some reason?

"Then you'll just have to learn to like dancing, singing, and the visual arts!" She exclaimed flippantly.

"But then, you'll be a tomboy." He protested.

And she replied, "So is Alex, what's your point?" Referring to their 15-year old sister Alexandra. 'Alex', as she liked to be called, didn't own even one skirt. Very strong-willed and obstinate at times, Alex had come to call Katharine Hepburn her 'spirit animal' after watching The Philadelphia Story for the first time earlier that year.

Evan groaned as she finally turned off the faucet. Actually, he was more concerned about what others would think of him. Stephanie had to be the girliest of girls, having joined a sorority during freshman year of university as well as the drama club. If those skills transferred over to Evan, then what kind of person was he in this reality, exactly?

His sister dried herself off, wrapping a fuzzy pink towel across her body before dressing in a floral print sundress for the afternoon. He waited for her to come back to his room and sit down at Evan's desk, now converted into a vanity table with all of her (now his) fashion accessories. Evan had no difficulty applying makeup to Stephanie's face, finding the process similar to painting (except the subject being a living person and the canvas being her complexion). As if he did this every day, Evan explained the nuances of bringing out the inner beauty of a young woman to his sister, who listened with curiosity and intrigue. He wouldn't want to use any concealer or foundation himself, of course, but he recognised clogged pores, spots, and stress lines previously ignored and knew how to remedy each of these little imperfections.

"I have to admit," Mentioned Evan, gently tracing a pencil over Stephanie's eyebrows, "You don't need much work to look pretty already." The compliment caused her to glow warmly sitting there in the chair, looking into the mirror as her brother worked his new magic.

For extra flourish, Evan plugged in a blow dryer and straightener and worked away at Stephanie's locks of brunette hair with blonde highlights. She stared in amazement as wavy frills descended down her neck and shoulders, and as he tucked back her bangs with clinical precision, almost like the stars on her favourite TV show, Queer Eye for the Straight Guy. She could recall watching re-runs with her sorority sisters several nights a week, sharing the occasional bottle of wine sneaked into the student housing dormitories where she had lived freshman year, but the techniques Evan used were totally unfamiliar to her now.

"Y'know little bro, you could have a career as a fashion designer! Or at least start a YouTube channel teaching other girls how to do this." Stephanie quipped. He winced at the thought, but continued to untangle and freshen her shoulder-length locks of hair. He couldn't remember ever learning how to do this, but the process was so automatic and second nature it was like riding a bicycle to him.

Of course the way her sundress complements her blue eyes means she needs less fixing up, duh! So Evan reduced the mascara wand to the bare minimum needed to get just enough of that 'it' factor... isn't it obvious?

A few minutes later Evan was done. Stephanie marveled at her appearance, which he didn't hesitate to advise her on how to achieve such a 'simple, natural' look with a few tips. She slipped on a pair of sandals and was about to leave, before Evan stopped her.

"You don't have to leave just yet? Why don't I make us some lunch?"

His sister tilted her head a little. "Sure, I guess! What do you want to eat?"

Her brother smirked, "I have a few ideas..."

---


"Wow, Evan! This garden salad is fantastic!" Stephanie laid down her fork. Less than an hour later, the brother and sister sat down at the table finishing lunch.

"It's an easy recipe to throw together," Explained Evan. "I think the blue cheese crumbles give it a unique texture, and the dried cranberries contrast well with the spinach leaves, don't you think?"

Stephanie merely grunted in agreement, evidently not appreciating yet another of her former artistic talents... the culinary arts. Living a life at university and growing tired of the same boring dining hall food, Stephanie quickly became adept at preparing tasty, healthy meals on a budget. She had been the de facto chef for her two roommates at least three nights a week. She would browse the Internet for fun and imaginative recipes, committing them to an increasingly encyclopedic knowledge base that, she hoped, she could use whenever she decided to settle down with a man.

On the other hand, Evan's cooking skills were limited to Ramen noodles, grilled cheese sandwiches, and easy to follow instructions on the side of insta-rice boxes. Not needing to live on his own yet, and benefiting from a boyish fast metabolism, he hadn't developed a breadth of cooking skills like Stephanie had. When it came to grilling or frying, Evan didn't mind it if meats got burnt a little... better to be on the safe side, right?

"I didn't know you had so many different skills," Remarked Evan finally, as Stephanie got up to leave out the front door. In the driveway was the used Hyundai compact car she had saved using her wages as a campus tour guide freshman year.

She turned around and smiled. "Yeah? You're not so bad at a few things yourself. Well... see you later tonight!"

Evan watched her drive away and went back into the house. Cleaning up their settings from lunch, he pondered what to do next. He was alone in the house at the moment, so he figured he, too, would go out and test out his powers some more. The question is: Where does Evan go next? The park (from earlier) is a short walk away, and the weather was warm but should bring a lot of people outside as potential swappees. Then there's the cinema, just a bit further of a walk, and there's that film Evan's wanted to see for months. Chances are he might meet some friends from school there as well, since the cinema seemed to be one of the trendy places to hang out due to its proximity to the shopping mall and several swanky restaurants.

Where does Evan go next?

Evan decided to go to the park. He saw the park like he never did before. He was looking at it not with his old eyes but with the eyes of an artist. He could see the trees, the birds the sky, and the people in a different light. He could imagine the colors he would use when he painted the scene.

He was walking around in sort of a daze when he saw someone he knew, Allison his best friend's little eleven year old sister.

"Hi Evan," she said.

Allison is a cute little girl who is very girlie in her disposition, she wants to be a woman but she is still a little girl. Evan could see that her cheeks were a bit redder than they should be. She was obviously using a little blush not that she had much experience with makeup yet.

"Oh just enjoying the day. What about you?"

"He's out with his girlfriend. They are all lovey dovey. The things I could tell you."

"You can? Great." Miranda said. She was happy that Evan wanted to take her. He never liked to when Miranda asked him before. But it was one less thing that she needed to do so she didn't worry about it.

Alex got her bag and put in what she needed, clothes for dance, deodorant, a bottle of water and some apple slices in case she needed a snack after practice and whatever else she wanted to bring.

The car was parked on the street a few doors down from their house. On the way Alex said quietly, "I wish I could drive."

"What?" Evan asked he didn't hear her.

"I said I wish I was the one who was driving and you were the one going to dance." The second part she didn't mean.

"Like I want to learn to dance."

"If you felt like I did you would, Dance is so much fun," Alex told him defensively.

"If you say so."

"No really we should swap that."

"Swap what?"

"We should swap my love for dance with your ability to drive."

"I don't think so."

"Yes lets do it, I'll swap my dance class and love for dance for your ability and knowledge to drive the car."

"I don't know."

"If you are in the class, you will be able to see if the friend thing worked. Most of the girls I dance with are my friends."

"Well...."

"Please, Please, Please!" Alex begged.

"Oh, OK, let's swap that."

A moment later, Alex and Evan swapped positions. Alex was on the drivers side of the car, she was carrying the car keys and she had a driver's license in her pocket. Evan was now on the passenger side. He was carrying over his shoulder the bag that contained all of Alex's now his dance supplies. Back at the house, everything that had to do with dance was transferred from Alex's room to Evan's room, including the posters on the wall and the pictures of the entire dance class. Including one of Alex posing with her team just before one of their dance recitals. Evan took her place in the picture, he was wearing the same dance costume that everyone else were wearing. It was a custom made gold leotard with an attached skirt. He wore it with glittery nude tights and ballet slippers just like the rest of the girls.
1243.title: Dance class

choices: Alex goes on a joy ride
12431.content:
Alex got into the drivers side of the car. She put on her seat belt and waited for Evan to do the same. She put the key in the ignition and started her up. She remembered driving before and knew how to drive but she also knew that this was really her first time driving a car. Excited was too tame a word for what she was experiencing.

She wasn't driving fast but she enjoyed the experience immensely. Normally she wouldn't have her learners permit for another year an a half and then if all went well she wouldn't have a license for six months after that but she didn't have to wait. She was licensed to drive now. If for whatever reason she was pulled over she could show the police officer a valid license with her name and picture. She was having so much fun she took the long way towards the dance studio.

Evan was also excited. He found the prospect of dancing fantastic. He loved dance and couldn't wait to try it. He could remember everything that Alex had known about dancing. He remembered begging his mother to allow him to take dance classes years ago. It was similar to the way Alex begged him to swap driving abilities. Hew remembered his first dance class and everything that happened there. He remembered his first recital in front of an audience and everything else that Alex had learned. But he knew this would be the first time he was doing it for real. His memories he knew weren't really his but soon it would be him performing all the moves.

Then for a second he started to worry. Could he really move like Alex? He knew he had swapped all her skills but until he actually did it he couldn't really be sure. He needn't have worried, because he could now do anything then it came to dance that Alex could. He not only had her flexibility and knowledge he also had her grace and fluidity of movement that came with seven years of dance classes.

"Alex," Evan said hesitantly, "if this doesn't work out, we can swap back immediately."

"Yeah, sure." Alex said. But Alex didn't want to talk at all she was having too much fun driving.

They arrived at the dance studio. Evan bounded out of the car with the energy and grace of a dancer. Alex was undecided as to practice driving some more or see her brother dance from the waiting room. In the end she just had to see her brother practicing with all the other girls. Evan was undecided as to whether to enter the boys or girls dressing room. He remembered changing in the girls room with 'his friends' but before he could decide, Karen his best friend grabbed him by the arm. "What are you waiting for slow poke?" she questioned. Since Alex took the long way to practice they had arrived later than they should have.

Karen led Evan into the girls locker room. There were several girls already in there and no one said a word when Evan entered. Well they didn't say a word to Evan, they were all chattering away as girls often do. Evan and Karen's lockers were right next to each other. Karen removed her clothes right in front of Evan. She was talking about something, but Evan wasn't paying much attention. Evan decided it was best to just change as fast as possible and get out of there. He looked into the bag he had brought and could his dance attire. It was the same as the attire that Alex usually wore: black basic leotard with short sleeves, black sports bra,, white tights and pale pink dance slippers all in his size.

Evan took off his clothes quickly trying not to look around at the half naked young girls. He didn't want to think of himself as a pervert. He had to get completely naked to put on his outfit. There wasn't a need to wear underwear under his tights. Once naked he balled his tights and slipped them up his legs. He didn't even realize that he knew how to do it instinctively. That 'talent' must have been passed to him with the rest of Alex's dance knowledge. Next he put on his sports bra even though he didn't need one. The leotard followed and finally his ballet slippers. Once dressed he exited the locker room into the main dance area. Karen kept talking non-stop throughout the process although Evan didn't know what she was talking about.

A short while later, the dance teacher Mrs. Jardin, announced "Students please take your places." Evan knew where to go and what to expect next. They would start with simple dance related stretching exercises. Evan was amazed at how flexible he was. He could not only kick higher than his head, but he could do a complete split and bend from his waist such that his nose could touch his shins.

Alex in the stands was giggling at how her brother look in his dance apparel, although no one else found it in the least bit strange. Even the outline of Evan's penis which was clearly visible wasn't of concern to anyone. As far as everyone was concerned he had been a student of that class just like anyone else.

Ten minutes of walking around without a bra convinced her that wearing a bra was necessary, not optional. She returned to a room to reapply her bra.

Meanwhile, Evan exited the house to get a bite to eat. On the way, he thought about his life. He had a fresh perspective of himself. He realized how much potential he had, but he was wasting it. He should be more serious about his school work and life in general.

What he really needed was a job. He could use the money and it would keep him out of trouble.

Evan entered the cafe and took a seat. He crossed his legs daintily as he looked over the menu.

" Can I get you something to drink while you are deciding?" the busboy said.

" Yes, can I have a cup of decaf?" Evan would normally order a soda but with his mother's personality decaf coffee was all he wanted.

A while later, the waitress visited the table. Evan ordered something from the healthy choice section of the menu, seared salmon served with rice and broccoli. The waitress took the order and was on her way.

The waitress was dressed in the uniform of the diner, Evan thought she was very pretty. Evan thought this girl might be good for her son, er herself, when he had his personality back. She was pretty and had a resposible job.

When the waitress returned with the food, Evan told her, " You're very good at your job."

The waitress complained about the job. That she hated having to wear the uniform, the problems in the back, customers who didn't treat her that she wanted and several other things. Evan lost respect foor her.

By the end of her soliloquy, Evan realized he was wrong about the girl. He did wish he had her job. Maybe he should apply now before getting his personality back. He probably would chicken out then.

" Your job seems pretty nice. You should appreciate it. Are they hiring here?"

The frustrated waitress said, "Aleays. You know, I wish I never took this job. You want my job, you can have it.

Without any warning, Evan and the waitress swapped places. The waitress was sitting at the table with Evan's meal in front of her. She was also wearing Evan's clothing.

Evan was standing over the table wearing the diner's uniform which in this case consisted of a white blouse with a black skirt, black tights and flats.

" Hello," Evan said in a sweet voice.

" Nothing really, just talking with Mom." Evan didn't want to tell his friend about his new power.

The conversation lasted for over half an hour. Evan didn't talk about what he formerly would talk about. Evan's interests had changed. He talked about gossip, recipes, dramas on TV and other topics of interest to his new personality. After a while, Evan asked his friend, " Want to go shopping and get a bite to eat?"

" Sure." Evan agreed for a place to meet. Then he got off the phone.

" We don't have to swap friends," Evan told his mother.

"Sure thing," Miranda said and then she returned to what she was doing.

Evan looked himself over and decided to change his clothes. What would have been appropriate for Evan to wear with his former friends, he didn't think was appropriate anymore. He went to his room to select a new outfit. He selected something his mother would prefer him to wear, slacks and casual polo shirt. These were clothing that Miranda had purchased, but Evan almost never wore. When he was out shopping, he would buy more apparel of this type. (Evan also replaced his underwear with a pair that didn't have a hole in it. He knew no one would see it, but the thought of wearing underwear in such disrepair didn't appeal to him. He threw the old pair in the garbage.)

Evan looked at himself with new eyes. He realized his own potential and how he was wasting it. He could do better in school if he wanted. He should dress better, not just now, but always. He realized that if you look well groomed, others will treat you with respect. Everything that his mother had been telling him, that he had mostly ignored, Evan now saw the value in. If he made the proper changes, there wasn't any limit to what he could achieve. He just had to take things much more seriously.

The first thing he would do, would be to get a hair cut. He was sure, Kristen wouldn't mind stopping off. It wouldn't take more than twenty minutes to style his hair properly. When he returned to his own personality, he was sure he would see the benefit of a new style. Besides he understood how important it was and would remember after the swap back. (Evan was also scared that if he didn't do it now, he wouldn't want to later.)

Before putting on his clothes, Evan did something he had never done before. He took out the iron and pressed his slacks. Then he selected half of his clothing, (the older and more shabby looking) and threw them away. He needed room for all the new stuff he was going to buy. Evan also wished he could 'straighten up' his room, but there wasn't time for that. It was all the things his mother wanted him to do but he wouldn't allow her.)

"Kristen, I hate to ask this of you. But can we stop by the barber. I just need to get a trim."

Evan met Mark at the mall. He was sitting at a bench, reading a book. One hand was holding the book, while the other cradled his purse which sat next to him. Mark was simultaneously exactly how Evan expected him to be and the opposite of how he remembered him. Gone was the sports jerseys, ripped jeans and worn sneakers with white socks.

The first thing that caught Evan's eye, even before the style of Mark's hair, was the showy red floral button-down v-neck tunic that Mark was wearing. Mark's physique hadn't changed, but his tastes obviously had. Previously, Mark would have never warn something so womanly. He eas wearing capri length black leggings which exposed his bare shins down to the three inch mules he wore. His legs were also crossed in a feminine fashion at the knee, with the left shoe dangling off his bare foot.

His hair was dyed honey blond and fell down the sides of his face in delicate curls all the way down to the top of his shoulder blades. Although his makeup was understated, his eyebrows were arched in a feminine manner.

When Mark got up to greet Evan, Evan noticed the tunic was cinched at the waist (giving an illusion of a narrow waist ) and loosely fell to the top of his thighs hiding his penile bulge. He must have either tucked his dick between his legs or flattened it with a girdle. Mark minced towards Evan with his hands in the air. When he greeted him, before even saying hello, Mark gave Evan a peck on both his cheeks. Evan instinctively returned the favor.

Before shopping, Evan and Mark stopped in for a bite to eat at Applebee's. Mark ordered the Apple Walnut Salad and Evan ordered the Caesar Salad With Grilled Chicken.

The topic of conversation, was something Evan was very interested in and Mark loved to talk about. Namely, gossip about their friends, family and acquaintances. Evan instinctively already knew what was up with most of his friends, but it was nice that it was confirmed by Mark.

Most of his friends, had personalities which would be typical of middle-aged women. Their new personalities, modified the projection of their lives. Mark for example, although he was still in high school, wasn't working at Burger King, he was working at a nail salon. He was seriously dating a man it is late forties who Mark suspected was waiting for high school graduation to ask him to marry him.

All of Evan's friends had similar lives. Lots of the boys were in long term relationships with men twice their age. They were interested in getting married and having children. Or meeting a man who already had children who were adult age and would make Evan's friends instant grandparents.

Even the girls that Evan knew had changed. Some were more mature and were more gentlemanly and dating Evan's male friends. ( There were people that Evan had never met before that had also changed. Such as the man that Mark was now dating. )

On the other hand, Amy who had been Evan's girlfriend was now hardly an acquaintance to Evan. Amy's personality hadn't changed it all. Thus, Amy and Evan hardly knew each other.

How did Evan feel about all the changes to his friends?

Gone were the conversations about silly things such as sports and treating girls like sex objects. In there place were conversations about relationships and making the world nicer and prettier and best of all delicious gossip.

Hearing about his friends ( after the swap ) was great fun. Hearing about big strong teenage boys giving up their childish games and acting like responsible, caring adults ( women ) was endlessly amusing. Many of these boys were planning on getting married and raising families in the near future.

The parents of these changed boys were also changed. Grown women would keep in shape and have fun by playing sports like baseball and football. They also liked video games and such. Many of these women were friends of Miranda.

As she exited her room she crossed paths with her young brother Stephen who was a freshman in Katherine's high school. Due to the staggered starting time, he didn't have to be at school until 10:15. Katherine's first class as with all juniors and seniors was 7:30.

"Good morning Kathy," he said cheerily before heading downstairs. Katherine mumbled some sort of response before going into the bathroom. Katherine thought Stephen was crazy. He could sleep almost as late as he wanted and he chose to get up at 6 in the morning. Katherine wished she could still be sleeping right now.

What the hell is going on? she thought as she stared into the mirror. Why is my head pounding like this? Oh, yeah the wine.

That's when she suddenly remembered the dream she had last night, the voice in her head. The voice called himself Evan. She could see his face, but she never knew anyone named Evan. Evan looked like a young girl, but Katherine knew he was a teenaged boy. He had told her that she now had the power to swap anything with another person as long as she had their permission. Evan kept saying, it worked for me, It'll work for you!

It sounded absurd, but maybe, just maybe, this pounding in her head was due to the fact that she had been imbued with this power. Her period had started, her PMS was gone and she never had a hangover before.

Of course, it could be a drunken hallucination. But Katherine felt it was real for some reason. She didn't know why.

She was dying to know, so she forced herself to get ready as fast as possible so she could see if it was true. Once she was dressed and applied her makeup, Katherine headed downstairs and took stock of what she had to work with.

Her father Thomas had already left for work but the rest of his family was in the kitchen. There was Stephen of course, and her sissy-mary brother Harrison who was only ten years old, but everyone assumed he would be gay and his mother Charlotte who wanted to find a job next year when Harrison got into middle school. Katherine thought about what she would do before deciding to...
13323211344541225.title: A new beginning

choices: They demand Steven give them their traits back
They are looking for Katherine, but don't know where she is
133232113445412251.content:
Katherine pulled Steven aside. She knew Stephen was a morning person and would prefer to start classes early. She had talked to him about it before, but couldn't understand it. Regardless, this was the perfect opportunity to kill two birds with one stone.

" Hey Stephen, how would you like to go to early classes?" Katherine asked.

" I'd love to, but I guess I'll have to wait until I'm a junior like you."

" I just had this dream. I can swap traits with another person if they agree. How about we swap school starting times?"

" That's stupid. That can't work."

" If it does work, I'll let you swap anything you want with me later. Give it a shot." Katherine explained her dream and her belief that it will work.

" Okay, what do I do?"

" Just agree to swapping school starting times with me."

Stephen did as requested. Immediately, he felt he had to hurry or he would be late for class. Both Steven and Katherine knew instinctively that it worked.

What Steven knew now but Katherine didn't realize was that they actually swapped classes. Steven had the classes of a high school junior and Katherine was back to freshman classes.

Steven left for school and Katherine return to bed. She wanted to take a nap and think about how to use her new power.

At his first class, Steven recognized his sister's friends: Marque, Kimberly and Allison ( the girl whose name used to be Katherine. Kelly wasn't there. She was back in grammar school. )

Steven knows all three, Marque is as fruity as his brother Harrison. Kimberly has a great body, but her face is a bit plain and she never wears makeup. Allison is the best of the bunch.

What happens next?

Katherine runs into Kelly at the grammar school
Katherine skips school.  Trouble with Charlotte
133232113445412252.content:
Katherine didn't want to go to school. She had a power to test out. Besides she didn't feel very well. She had the residual of her PMS, was nursing a hangover and unrelated do both conditions her head pounded.

" Mom, I don't feel so good. Can I stay home from school?" Katherine asked Charlotte. " Maybe after everyone had gone, she could try her swapping power with her mom," thought Katherine.

Charlotte had picked Katherine up from Marque's house. She knew all about the drinking that had gone on there. If Katherine had a hangover that was no excuse for skipping school. Charlotte was not going to reward Katherine's bad behavior with a day off from school.

" You get drunk last night. Embarrass me by making me pick you up. And you think you can stay home from school today? No way!"

Katherine knew her mother was adamant. She wouldn't let her skip school. She couldn't ask her mother to test her swapping power either. She would have to swap with someone else.

Swapping with Harrison was Katherine's best bet. If she swapped the right thing, she could also skip school. School seemed so unimportant when you get a gift like this, Katherine believed.

" Harri," Katherine began as she talked to her ten year old brother. Harrison preferred to be called Harri which is also the way he spelled it on all his papers. " I got this power. I can swap traits with anyone as long as I have their permission. Want to swap something with me?"

" Like Rogue on the X-Men?"

" Rogue?"

" Yeah, she's sort of steals the powers of the other X-Men by touching them."

" It's not exactly like that. I can only swap traits. And I don't steal them. I need permission."

Katherine went on to explain the story of how she got her powers, how her powers worked and that nobody would notice the swap.

" No kidding?"

" No kidding."

" Then I know exactly what I want to swap..."

Katherine sort of expected what Harrison would ask for. She was not disappointed.

Continuing Harrison said, " I want to swap clothing. Mom won't let me wear what I want. And you have the prettiest stuff."

" Okay, but if we swap that, then I want a swap in return."

" What?"

" Let's swap schools and classes." Katherine was sure that her mom would let her stay home if she was only in grammar school.

" Deal."

" But this swap is only for the day. We swap back tomorrow morning. That is part of the swap, okay?"

Harrison would agree to anything to be able to wear girl's clothing in public. He had tried on Katherine's clothing before, but it was too big for him. Plus, he couldn't let anyone see him wearing them.

" I agree. What happens n..." Harrison didn't finish his statement before he found himself wearing Katherine's outfit. He look down at himself to see the blouse Katharine had been wearing along with her leggings and flats. They had been resized to fit Harrison's ten year old body. He could also feel Katherine's bra hugging his chest, although it hung flat against his torso since he didn't have any breasts. ( Katherine didn't require any padding in her bra. Her boobs were quite impressive already. )

"Wow!" Harrison shouted. He ran his hands up and down his blouse to confirm he was wearing it. He felt the outline of the bra underneath the top. Finally, he scooted to the bathroom to look at himself in the mirror. He was slightly disappointed that he wasn't wearing any makeup, although he was wearing earrings. Harrison would never know how lucky he was that he didn't have Katherine's tampon inside him.

Katherine followed Harrison into the bathroom. She was wearing his non-descript boys jeans and t-shirt, along with his very worn sneakers. All was resized to fit Katherine's body. Katherine boobs sagged somewhat as they say were not supported by a bra. Also the outline of her areolas could be seen through her shirt.

Harrison turned and hugged Katherine. " I can't believe it," he shouted excitedly.

Harrison was about to ask Katherine to swap makeup too, but before he could, Charlotte entered the bathroom. " What's all the excitement?" she demanded.

" Kathy just gave me something," Harrison told her.

" What?"

" It's a secret."

" Whatever. Anyway hurry up. We got to go." Charlotte was going to drive Harrison to the high school. Formerly, Katherine would walk, but since Harrison was only ten, Charlotte had to drive him to school.

" Katherine, you had better hurry to. The school bus will be here soon," Charlotte continued.

" But Mommy, I don't feel very well."

" Kathy, we discussed this before. You're going to school today. And that's final!"

Harrison sat down to breakfast waiting for someone to say something about how he was dressed. But despite wearing obviously feminine clothing no one said a word to him about it. Harrison was ecstatic with the situation.

Harrison liked that he was wearing girly clothes, but since this was the only day he would be allowed to wear anything like this, he decided he wanted to wear something more extremely feminine. Leggings were girly pants but he didn't want to wear pants of any type.

Harrison purposefully spilled his cereal on himself so that he had to change into another outfit.

He ran to his room to select something 'pretty'. He wanted to wear something that he could never wear any other time. He stripped all his clothes off of himself leaving himself naked except for his thin watch. Throwing the clothes willy-nilly around his room.

He knew every stitch of clothes that Katherine owned and in what drawer it now was. First he selected a pair of boy shorts with a lacy trim in a pastel color. He combined it with a matching bra. He put both on, they fit his small frame like a glove. Although, there was a little he could do about the small bulge in his pants.

He hadn't been wearing socks of any kind before, but he wanted to wear some tights today. It was warm, but he didn't care. He found a pair of white tights. It took him a couple of minutes to figure out how to get them on, but he found a way.

He knew which top he wanted to wear and where to find it. In his closet he retrieved a button-down blouse with puff sleeves. He thought it made him look a little bit like a princess.

To go with the blouse, Harrison selected a short skirt which showed off his nylon covered legs. Harrison knew instinctively how long the skirt had to be without causing too much commotion at the high school.

Finally, Harrison selected shoes with a 2-inch heel. The flats were nice and obviously girly, but this was his time to wear heels.

To finish off the look, Harrison removed the studs from his ears and replaced them with hoop earrings. The studs were pretty, but not as noticeable as the hoop earrings. Especially with his short hair in a boyish cut.

Harrison was happy with his look when he returned to the breakfast table.

" Why so dressy?" Charlotte inquired.

" I don't know. I just felt like dressing up today," Harrison lied.

" You look very nice."

" Thank you Mommy."

Katherine knew she had to go to school. She couldn't defy her mother, besides how tough could grammar school be. She did have a problem though with her boobs since she wasn't wearing a bra. She suspected that if she had been wearing one people would notice and she would be teased. But, she was still seventeen years old and could deal with any of the other students. She needed the support.

When she went into Harrison's room to find a bra, she found that they had all been resized to his ten-year-old boys frame. None would fit and besides they didn't have any cups to support her boobs. She hadn't any choice but to leave the house without wearing a bra. Although she did pack extra tampons that she might need later on.

She got on the bus when it arrived and took a seat. No one gave her a disapproving glance in the bus or while she was waiting at the stop.

She used her time to think about what she would do next. She decided it probably wasn't a good idea to swap with the little children at the grammar school.

Ten or fifteen minutes after getting on the bus, Kelly also entered the same bus. Katherine knew Kelly as the younger sister of her friend Marque. Katherine didn't want to talk to her, she was still thinking about how to use her power. But Kelly came up to her anyway.

" I want my life back," Kelly told Katherine without preamble in a confidential tone.

Katherine didn't have any idea of Kelly wad talking about. As far as Katherine knew, she received her power sometime last night after going to bed.

"What?"

" You heard me, I want my life back!"

" Your life back? I don't know what you're talking about."

" My life. We swapped lives. I want mine back."

Katherine feigned ignorance. She didn't know how Kelly knew about her swapping power. But regardless she hadn't swapped anything with Kelly. She couldn't have. This was the first time she saw her after receiving her power.

" I don't know what you're talking about," Katherine reiterated. " Get away from me!"

But Kelly wouldn't leave. Instead she told Katherine, " I did some reading. You may think that this is a good thing, but it's not. This swapping thing is giving to people by a demon named Blargington. He does it for his own amusement. It always ends badly for everyone involved. Especially the person he gives the power to. It's not a blessing, it's a curse. So you had better make things right before it gets too far."

"Leave me alone!"

"Blargington is really evil. He does this all the time. He makes these devices and gives them to people or makes one person out of two. He is really sick!"

By this time, Kelly is screaming at the top of her lungs. The matron of the bus comes over to quiet her. The matron made Kelly sit far away from Katherine. When the bus stopped, Kelly was escorted to the guidance office.

Katherine had to wait until recess or gym before she could talk to the other students. During class time there was, of course, a strict no talking policy. The teacher ran a very efficient classroom.

During gym, Katherine struck up a conversation with one of the girls. She was wearing a skirt with matching tights and a leotard. All the other girls were wearing gym shorts and t-shirts. During class, this girl had been wearing a pretty dress.

The girl said, " We are very religious. My parents won't alow me to wear pants and t-shirts like all my friends. At school, they only allow me to wear dresses. Even skirts are too casual for school they tell me. I wish I could wear jeans and stuff like that like everyone else. But my mom won't let me. I tried them on at a friend's house. I love them."

An idea came to Katherine's mind. Charlotte wouldn't allow Harrison to wear girls clothing. And this girl's mother wouldn't allow her to wear pants and t-shirts. Katherine could swap apparel with this girl and then when she swap back with Harrison she would be doing him a great favor. Katherine knew how much Harrison wanted to wear girls clothing. " He would love a lifetime in skirts and dresses." Katherine knew. Katherine knew she could use her power to help people.

"Here's the plan. You take the men's bathroom pass, and sneak into the women's room. The one that's a single stall with a locking door Then I'll ask for the women's pass, and meet you in there in two minutes. Get ready. When you hear a knock, open up; then this is all yours."

Evan nervously got up and asked for the hall pass. He took it and headed to the women's room. He turned the knob; it was unlocked, so he went in after making sure the coast was clear. He was nervous as he waited. He did actually find Tina quite attractive; he did even used to have a crush on her -- which was why he was still nervous around her. But with a wonderful girlfriend like Amy and Tina being his friend's sister, acting on that never seemed like a good idea. Still, swapping with Tina did seem exciting for that reason. "What are you doing lingering in the halls, Tina?" Miss McConnis asked.

"Someone is in the bathroom. They're taking forever." Tina pleaded.

"There's plenty of other bathrooms in the school. Go use one of them."

Tina smiled and nodded and walked away slowly, hoping to see Evan humiliated. Sure enough, Miss McConnis knocked on the door. Tina could hear the doorknob turning...

From Evan's perspective, all the requirements from the agreement were now met. His magic initiated.

Miss McConnis left in a confused daze.

15123222111111111131.content:
As shocking as it felt having her body, life, and powers taken from her, Denise had more important things to do. She could ask "Evan" to swap everything back later. What mattered now was getting home (to Denise's house, that is) and being there when Brent arrived to drop off Anna.

Since her ex-husband was supposed to arrive in fifteen minutes, Denise didn't have much time to get ready to meet him. Though they had been divorced for three years now, she still hadn't totally gotten over him. Anyone else would have moved on and found another man... at least that's what Denise's coworkers told her after hearing her talk about him for the umpteenth time at work.

Why bother trying to look nice for a man who has since married another woman? That ship has sailed... but it didn't stop Denise from gazing at herself critically in front of her washroom mirror:

https://imgur.com/a/NuGUoJi

Denise cradled her hands against her wide, womanly hips. Hips that bore only one child, Anna, the most precious person in her life now. The court order stipulated that Brent and Denise would share custody of their daughter and trade off every Saturday.

Dressed modestly in a flowing, orange peasant skirt covering a pair of nylon stockings, Denise moved her eyes up to her plain sleeveless top. Despite seeing a pair of D-cup breasts resting on her chest, the old Evan had none of her old male interests to indicate whether the 'girls' still looked good.

Sure, Brent loved feeling them up when they were married, often commenting on them and how they would drive him mad. At one point, Denise even considered breast enlargement surgery because of how he reacted around them. And that's not all; her sensitive, thimble-sized nips would always draw his gaze to them when they were together in bed...

Denise sighed and turned around, getting a better look at her hair and backside in the mirror. She knew Brent would arrive in a moment but it was like seeing her body for the first time:

https://imgur.com/a/YFP9AHm

Why was she so fixated on her ex-husband? He wasn't the only man who drew her lustful eyes lately either. Even that neighbour boy Evan got her all hot and bothered now. Denise had to remind herself that she was that neighbour boy just a few minutes ago. How could she find her old body attractive, yet stare at this woman in the mirror without a flicker of desire?

She hadn't been laid in over a year. She kindled a brief romance with an old flame she knew in high school, but he panicked and left when she brought up the subject of marriage. There were few men out there interested in marrying a 40-year-old single mother with only a high school level education, Denise learnt bitterly.

Maybe that's why she both hated and loved Brent. After she gave birth to Anna, she agreed to stay home and take care of her while he went to university. After a few years he found himself a high-paying office job and spent more and more time away from home while Denise raised their daughter. And then, one night three years ago, Brent revealed that he had been having an affair with another woman who worked at the same company as him.

She remembered being furious with him. Saying several things she wished she could take back. Brent's new wife was a sexy young bimbo, in her mid-twenties who looked like she tumbled tits-first out of a glamour magazine.

Denise was lucky to have signed a pre-nup, because after the divorce she kept their house and about half of their wealth. Since Anna was old enough to take care of herself, that allowed Denise to work full time again. But appealing jobs were limited for a woman of her age and experience, so she took the first job she could find: hustling tables as a barmaid at the local pub.

Denise snapped back to attention when the doorbell rang.

Smoothing out her top and skirt, she opened the door and greeted Brent and Anna.

"Hello my little sunshine!" Denise hugged Anna tightly. "Oh my, you must be having a growth spurt. You're getting so big!"

"Thanks," Beams Anna, adjusting her glasses. "All the kids at school are noticing too!"

"Why don't you come inside? I have your favourite meal heating in the oven." Denise stepped to the side as Anna took off her shoes and entered her house. "Let me just have a word with your father."

"Okay! See you next week Dad." She waved at him and set down her backpack in the hallway. Denise kept enough of Anna's clothing at her house so she wouldn't have to pack and unpack a suitcase every week.

"Goodbye, pumpkin. So, what's up, babe?" Brent asked, folding his arms and leaning against the door frame.

"What is she doing here?" Denise spat, glancing behind Brent at the car humming at the curb next to the driveway. In the front passenger seat was his current wife and the object of Denise's envy. "You know how I hate seeing her come around here."

"Relax, Denise, we're out running some errands." Brent explained. "After dropping Anna off at your place we're going to the store, then going to pick up the dry cleaning, and returning some books at the library."

"The library, huh? I don't see why you need her along for that. You have to be able to read to go there." Denise retorted icily.

"Right. Well, please take care of Anna this week." Said Brent. "And I know we're not seeing each other anymore... but if you ever wanna go out to grab a cup of tea or anything..."

His offer caused Denise's heart to skip a beat. But she wouldn't let her desire betray her resolve against her ex. "I'll think about it and give you a call." She said curtly.

"I'm just trying to be nice," He raised his hands gently. "Just because we're not together doesn't mean I don't still think about you. Still care about you."

Denise struck a pose, flicking back her hair contemptuously, and threw another haughty glance at the woman in the car. He put his hands in his pockets, turned around, and climbed back into the car and drove off.

Denise's heart was beating furiously. Does he really want to go out with me sometime? Oh gosh, it doesn't mean much but what if he feels the same way towards me as I do about him? I hope he has finally had enough of that slag!

She wouldn't admit she was still in love with him, as it frustrated her to no end to see that other woman with him and her daughter.

But she could think about him, and about "Evan", and about all other men later.

This week she had her Anna. Her wonderful daughter.

Maybe Denise could somehow use her to get her old body and life back? Despite having Denise's memories, knowledge, and personality, she still remembers being Evan Wilson. Though most of those memories were swapped away and feel more like a vivid dream now.

Anna spends time with the Wilson kids. Not to mention that Miranda Wilson is somewhat of an acquaintance of Denise Gerard. How does Evan, trapped as Denise Gerard, get an opportunity to meet up with his old body again?
